meta_title: What Is Defined Waste? Definition & Maintenance Impact
meta_description: Defined waste refers to non-value-added activities in industrial operations. Identify and eliminate maintenance inefficiencies like Mura, Muri, and Muda today.
title: What Is Defined Waste?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is Defined Waste?

image_prompt: A high-resolution, professional photo of a modern industrial facility. In the foreground, a diverse pair of maintenance technicians in clean PPE (hard hats, high-visibility vests) are looking at a digital tablet together. The background shows a highly organized, clean production line with robotic arms and conveyor systems. The lighting is bright and clinical, emphasizing a "Lean" and waste-free environment. No text or overlays.
